import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BookOpen, Mail, Phone, Globe, Users, Clock, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, Youtube } from 'lucide-react'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const quickLinks = [ { name: 'Home', path: '/' }, { name: 'Live Classes', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'About Us', path: '/about' }, { name: 'Contact', path: '/contact' } ]; const courses = [ { name: 'Web Development', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'MERN Stack', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'AI & Machine Learning', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'Digital Marketing', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'Python Programming', path: '/courses' }, { name: 'Linux Administration', path: '/courses' } ]; const support = [ { name: 'Help Center', path: '/contact' }, { name: 'Demo Classes', path: '/contact' }, { name: 'Student Portal', path: '/contact' }, { name: 'Parent Guide', path: '/contact' } ]; const socialLinks = [ // { name: 'Facebook', icon: , url: '#' }, // { name: 'Twitter', icon: , url: '#' }, { name: 'Instagram', icon: , url: 'https://www.instagram.com/kodezacademy/' }, { name: 'LinkedIn', icon: , url: 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/kodez-academy' }, { name: 'YouTube', icon: , url: 'https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVGQSz5NQE2UhZF_EOhElZA' } ]; return (
{/* Company Info */}

); }; export default Footer;
